description: This file is the main React component for the application, managing the routing between login, game selection, and game views via internal state. It includes the setup for context providers, navigation, theme toggling, and conditional rendering of the Snake and Racing games.

methods.name: RootApp()
methods.description: Main React component that initializes the user context and renders the root flow.

methods.name: RootFlow()
methods.description: Handles the internal routing and state management for login, game selection, and game views.

methods.name: onLogin
methods.description: Callback to handle user login, sets username and transitions to game selection.

methods.name: onSelectGame
methods.description: Handles game selection, sets active game tab.

methods.name: onLogout
methods.description: Logs out the user and returns to login view.
